document_data.name: Hill Elders
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hill Elders''' was the ruling council of the [[elven]] nation of [[Evereska]] ''circa'' the [[1479 DR|Year of the Ageless One, 1479 DR]].
document_data.Organization: It consisted of warriors, nobles and mages presided over by a High Elder.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Hill Elders held court in the [[High Hall of the Hunt]] in Evereska.
